name: Assimulato
description:
Make sure audio is enabled for best experience! You are a malfunctioned robot.  Fight your way out of the laboratory, destroy enemy robots, and recycle their scraps to craft upgrades for yourself to gain new abilities and weaponry.

. . .

Basic Controls

  • Move: WASD 
  • Pick up: Hold R-Click 
  • Shoot :   L-Click

. . .

Made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. The theme was "Stronger Together"

. . .

Made by:

  • ItsNotSimon - Programming/3D modelling
  • K4talyst - Music

. . .

Thanks to metricfern for helping design / test. 

. . .

All 3D models, music, sfx etc were made during the jam
